elementSpec.desc: provides a feature system declaration comprising one or more feature structure declarations or feature structure declaration links.
TO BE TRANSLATED
declares one type of feature structure.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: gives a name for the type of feature structure being declared.

gives the name of one or more typed feature structures from which this type inherits feature specifications and constraints; if this type includes a feature specification with the same name as that of any of those specified by this attribute, or if more than one specification of the same name is inherited, then the set of possible values is defined by unification. Similarly, the set of constraints applicable is derived by combining those specified explicitly within this element with those implied by the baseTypes attribute. When no baseType is specified, no feature specification or constraint is inherited.
attDef.valDesc: one or more names as defined by the W3C XML Specification

elementSpec.desc: describes in prose what is represented by the type of feature structure declared in the enclosing fsDecl.
TO BE TRANSLATED
associates the name of a typed feature structure with a feature structure declaration for it.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: supplies a pointer to a feature structure declaration (fsDecl) element within the current document or elsewhere.

elementSpec.desc: declares a single feature, specifying its name, organization, range of allowed values, and optionally its default value.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: indicates the name of the feature being declared; matches the name attribute of f elements in the text.
indicates whether or not the value of this feature may be present.

elementSpec.desc: describes in prose what is represented by the feature being declared and its values.
TO BE TRANSLATED

defines the range of allowed values for a feature, in the form of an fs, vAlt, or primitive value; for the value of an f to be valid, it must be subsumed by the specified range; if the f contains multiple values (as sanctioned by the org attribute), then each value must be subsumed by the vRange.
TO BE TRANSLATED

declares the default value to be supplied when a feature structure does not contain an instance of f for this name; if unconditional, it is specified as one (or, depending on the value of the org attribute of the enclosing fDecl) more fs elements or primitive values; if conditional, it is specified as one or more if elements; if no default is specified, or no condition matches, the value none is assumed.
TO BE TRANSLATED
defines a conditional default value for a feature; the condition is specified as a feature structure, and is met if it subsumes the feature structure in the text for which a default value is sought.
TO BE TRANSLATED
separates the condition from the default in an if, or the antecedent and the consequent in a cond element.
TO BE TRANSLATED
specifies constraints on the content of valid feature structures.
TO BE TRANSLATED

defines a conditional feature-structure constraint; the consequent and the antecedent are specified as feature structures or feature-structure collections; the constraint is satisfied if both the antecedent and the consequent subsume a given feature structure, or if the antecedent does not.
TO BE TRANSLATED

defines a biconditional feature-structure constraint; both consequent and antecedent are specified as feature structures or groups of feature structures; the constraint is satisfied if both subsume a given feature structure, or if both do not.
TO BE TRANSLATED
separates the condition from the consequence in a bicond element.
TO BE TRANSLATED
represents a feature structure, that is, a collection of feature-value pairs organized as a structural unit.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: specifies the type of the feature structure.
references the feature-value specifications making up this feature structure.
attDef.valDesc: one or more identifiers of f elements.

elementSpec.desc: represents a feature value specification, that is, the association of a name with a value of any of several different types.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: provides a name for the feature.
references any element which can be used to represent the value of a feature.
attDef.valDesc: the identifier of an element representing a feature value

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which can contain either of exactly two possible values.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.valDesc: a string representing a binary value (true or false, 0 or 1) .

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains one of a finite list of symbols.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: supplies the symbolic value for the feature, one of a finite list that may be specified in a feature declaration.

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains a numeric value or range.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: supplies a lower bound for the numeric value represented, and also (if max is not supplied) its upper bound.
supplies an upper bound for the numeric value represented.
specifies whether the value represented should be truncated to give an integer value.

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains a string.
TO BE TRANSLATED
represents the value part of a feature-value specification which appears at more than one point in a feature structure.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: supplies a name for the sharing point.

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains multiple values organized as a set, bag, or list.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: indicates organization of given value or values as set, bag or list.

valItem.desc: indicates that the given values are organized as a set.
indicates that the given values are organized as a bag (multiset).
indicates that the given values are organized as a list.

elementSpec.desc: represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains a defaulted value.
TO BE TRANSLATED
represents the value part of a feature-value specification which contains a set of values, only one of which can be valid.
TO BE TRANSLATED
represents a feature value which is the negation of its content.
TO BE TRANSLATED
represents a feature value which is the result of merging together the feature values contained by its children, using the organization specified by the org attribute.
TO BE TRANSLATED

attDef.desc: indicates the organization of the resulting merged values as set, bag or list.

valItem.desc: indicates that the resulting values are organized as a set.
indicates that the resulting values are organized as a bag (multiset).
indicates that the resulting values are organized as a list.

elementSpec.desc: assembles a library of feature elements.
TO BE TRANSLATED
assembles a library of reusable feature value elements (including complete feature structures).
TO BE TRANSLATED
